strapiPost.title: Art On The Bricks Art Walk Today In Rogers
strapiPost.content:
The Art on the Bricks Art Walk in Downtown Rogers is back again, and today’s theme is “Fashion, Steampunk, & Cosplay.” 

  • Some events: There will be opportunity to see student art and performances, anyone can attend the meet and greet with a 7’ tall dinosaur “muppet” named Miss Cricket, and a Scott Family Amazeum tent will be set up for people to learn and experience how dig sites are created and how artifacts are discovered. 
  • And more: The Rogers Experimental House will be a place of activity as well with a display of puppets created by the Clothing Construction and Fashion Design students from Arkansas Arts Academy. Students from Ozark will also be present doing Mannequin Modeling poses. 

Learn more about the schedule of events this evening HERE.
